title: Whats the difference between a Mystery Chest and a Mystery Skin
body: Can someone tell me if there is a difference? Their descriptions say the exact same thing so im curious.

replies.body: I JUST BOUGHT IT AND GOT ELEMENTALIST LUX! {{champion:99}} {{item:3041}}
And is it limited to champs we have ? Just to be sure XD
The 790 RP chest contains skins that are at least 975 RP I believe!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=jFKcETux,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-09T01:55:24.615+0000)
>
> The 790 RP chest contains skins that are at least 975 RP I believe!

Ok. Thanks!
